tool_description: Data from 41,175 zip codes, our API provides alternative hardiness zones, ensuring precise geographic insights for your projects.
name: Plant Hardiness Zone API: Accurate USDA Data
title: Plant Hardiness Zone API: Accurate USDA Data
tool_name: Plant Hardiness Zone API: Accurate USDA Data

api_list.name: Get hardiness zone data for a zipcode
api_list.description: Access hardiness zone information for a given US zipcode, including the primary hardiness zone designation and alternative zones if applicable. Understand the climatic conditions and plant suitability based on the provided hardiness zone data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://plant-hardiness-zone-api-accurate-usda-data.p.rapidapi.com/zipcodes/00601"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plant-hardiness-zone-api-accurate-usda-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://plant-hardiness-zone-api-accurate-usda-data.p.rapidapi.com/zipcodes/{zipcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plant-hardiness-zone-api-accurate-usda-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
